home.rest: I'm a web developer, focused on JavaScript and Node. Looking for work as a Junior.

education.title: Education
education.text: My interest in programming began a couple of years ago, after I've started using JavaScript add-ons for an online browser game and shortly I found myself trying to write my own. It made me more interested in IT so I went to professional technical school, EZN, which I completed in 2017. It also granted me "Certificate of competence, an IT technician". Unfortunately it only taught me the basics, so most of my knowledge I learnt myself.

skills.title: Skills
skills.text: I'm still much of a beginner, but I'm eager to learn and gain experience. My English is decent, I have a FCE on B2 level, while I'm not grammatically perfect, it's more than enough to understand documentation and handle communication. I'm best with JavaScript (and Node), that's what I use in most of my projects. Recently I picked up Vue, I also know SQL, obviously some HTML + CSS and basics of nginx.

other.title: Other
other.text: My other hobbies include gaming and cinematography. I really like competing with other players in multiplayer games like Dota2 and Counter-Strike. I've even participated in couple amateur tournaments (with various success). As for movies I not only enjoy watching them but I am also interested in the logistics behind them. My favourite movie is probably The Grand Budapest Hotel, for its perfect mix of humor and action.

projects.desc: List of all other projects I've done so far

list.title: TERA data parser (unfinished)
features: Serve that data as a table

404: Whoops, you weren't supposed to end up here. I suggest going back, currently it's as empty as space behind us.
